Aide's Essence

After using an Aide's Essence on a Hero, that
Hero is able to equip Aide accessories and
gets +1 to HP, Atk, Spd, Def, and Res.

Use Aide's Essence

Use Aide's Essence?

Heroes on whom Aide's Essence is
used can equip Aides. And they will
get +1 to HP, Atk, Spd, Def, and Res.
Use Aide's Essence
Choose the Hero to receive an Aide's Essence.

Aided Hero

HP, Atk, Spd, Def, Res +1

Use Aide's Essences on Heroes other than the
Aided Hero and they will receive +1 to HP, Atk,
Spd, Def, and Res. Plus they will be able to
equip Aides as accessories.

Using Aide's Essences:
When you use an Aide's Essence
on a Hero they receive +1 to HP,
Atk, Spd, Def, and Res, and they
gain the ability to equip Aides
as accessories.

Arena Effects:
Increases from Aide's Essences do
not influence how stats are treated
for opponent selection in modes
like Arena.

More Information:
You can equip Heroes other than
the Aided Heroes with Aides.
Any one Aide can be equipped to
any number of Heroes who have
been given an Aide's Essence.
